jd: Hi, This is Aakash Sharma from Ozin Technologies Inc. This email is reference to Jobs of “.NET Architect”. Please go through the job descriptions and let us know if you are interested in the same. Please reply with your updated resume and expected compensation. Title :: .NET Architect, Asset Wealth ManagementLocation :: San Ramon, CA (Onsite)- Local OnslyDuration :: 6+ MonthsVISA :: All (No H1 & CPT)Interview :: Phone/Video Submittal Process:*Linkedin resume must be UNDER 4 PAGES and include all contact info* candidates need to have LinkedIn profile with profile picture or a photo ID in the submittal Skills | Must-Haves:* 8+ years of professional experience* experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud* AWM (Asset Wealth Management)/Financial Services experience* strong communication skills Nice to Have Skills:* Azure certifications* Bachelor's Degree or higher
